dm:bugtracker.dm:product: SAP Data Intelligence 3 on SUSE CaaS Platform 4: Installation Guide

meta: SAP DI 3 on SUSE CaaSP 4 Installation Guide
This document describes the installation and configuration of SUSE CaaS Platform 4 and SAP Data Intelligence 3.
Installing SAP DI 3 on SUSE CaaSP 4

meta.name: productname
meta.productname: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications

meta: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP1

abstract.para: SAP* Data Hub 2 is the toolset to govern big amounts of data. SUSE CaaS Platform 4 is the Kubernetes base that makes deploying SAP Data Hub 2 easy. This document describes the installation and configuration of SUSE CaaS Platform 4 and SAP Data Hub 2.
